about_the_game:
🌞Game Background🌞

For many years, the village has believed that the goddess must be a virgin, otherwise the power will disappear.

Recently, there have been several incidents of "Reese" magic going wild. The goddess "Laleer" only showed a small piece of white arm when praying for "Reese" to forgive her sins, which caused the villagers to have wild thoughts... While people were fantasizing about Laleer, the sex-addicted goddess no longer had a firm attitude towards her responsibilities. She is no longer a virgin, and she has been partying with you all day and night.

While you are suppressing the powerful magic of "Reese", you are also helping the goddess "Laleer" to solve her high-intensity sexual desire. Miss "Shirley" invites you to escape with her? Perhaps the village will be like what "Shirley" said... it's only a matter of time before it falls.

Faith and desire, freedom and responsibility, the love and lust between you and the three girls are interwoven into a huge and complex web of fate.

💋Game Features💋

  • Unlock by eliminating: Unlock exquisite CG by eliminating three blocks, bringing you a beautiful visual enjoyment. 💝

  • Character and torn clothes system: Click on the character's character to interact, and add torn clothes/sexy props when attacking💝

  • Multiple heroines: Focus on shaping three female characters with different personalities, the game text is 20,000 words, and each character has an ending. 💝

  • Full story Japanese dubbing: immersive interpretation of character emotions. 💝

  • 18 full dynamic CG: detailed full dynamic H scene performance. 💝

  • One-click skip: fast forward, skip repeated content, easy to play. 💝

Character introduction

Name: Laleer "I don't want to be a goddess, I want to keep doing it"

Measurements: 88 (d)-59-85

The goddess is on the verge of depravity and awakening, The sex addiction is getting worse!

What you don't know is that her dark side all comes from you

Name: Reese "Lord Laleel is right!"

Measurements: 92 (g)-65-85

A naive and loyal little witch,a very easy to train dog

Her abilities are beyond her cognition, and her emotional fluctuations often make it difficult for her to control.

Name: Shirley Field "Goddess, times have changed"

Measurements: 91 (d)-62-88

The rebellious young lady changed her career to become a hunter, like a person who traveled through time

She is not good at it but works hard. Fearlessness and straightforwardness are her strengths

content_descriptors.notes:
This work contains pornographic content such as nudity, sex, and adults only. It is not suitable for players of all ages. Please consider carefully before purchasing!
The characters, place names, events, plots, etc. that appear in this work are all fictional, and all themes, content, and forms are fictional creations.
Any similarities are purely coincidental, and the fictional fantasy content contained in the content is for entertainment only.
All characters in this game are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Contact Us


About the Game

🌞Game Background🌞

For many years, the village has believed that the goddess must be a virgin, otherwise the power will disappear.

Recently, there have been several incidents of "Reese" magic going wild. The goddess "Laleer" only showed a small piece of white arm when praying for "Reese" to forgive her sins, which caused the villagers to have wild thoughts... While people were fantasizing about Laleer, the sex-addicted goddess no longer had a firm attitude towards her responsibilities. She is no longer a virgin, and she has been partying with you all day and night.

While you are suppressing the powerful magic of "Reese", you are also helping the goddess "Laleer" to solve her high-intensity sexual desire. Miss "Shirley" invites you to escape with her? Perhaps the village will be like what "Shirley" said... it's only a matter of time before it falls.

Faith and desire, freedom and responsibility, the love and lust between you and the three girls are interwoven into a huge and complex web of fate.

💋Game Features💋

  • Unlock by eliminating: Unlock exquisite CG by eliminating three blocks, bringing you a beautiful visual enjoyment. 💝

  • Character and torn clothes system: Click on the character's character to interact, and add torn clothes/sexy props when attacking💝

  • Multiple heroines: Focus on shaping three female characters with different personalities, the game text is 20,000 words, and each character has an ending. 💝

  • Full story Japanese dubbing: immersive interpretation of character emotions. 💝

  • 18 full dynamic CG: detailed full dynamic H scene performance. 💝

  • One-click skip: fast forward, skip repeated content, easy to play. 💝

Character introduction

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: In a world full of fantasy and romance, "Sexuality with girlfriends: Laler&Reese" will take you on a sweet journey exclusively for adults! The game is based on the simple and easy-to-use elimination game. Players need to complete various challenges by eliminating gems of the same color!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
